title: ACC.17 media registration open; important dates announced
text:
The 66th Annual Scientific Session of the American College of Cardiology will be March 17-19, 2017, at the Walter E. Washington Convention Center in Washington, D.C. The meeting will feature thousands of posters in addition to late-breaking clinical trial sessions.Here are some important dates for members of the media who wish to attend.
*               Media registration is now open at https://registration.experientevent.com/ShowACC171?Flowcode=MEDIA
*               Friday, March 17: ACC.17 beginsLate-breaking clinical trials will be presented on Friday, March 17, through Sunday, March 19, so please book your hotel accordingly.
meeting: The 66th Annual Scientific Session of the American College of Cardiology
